headline: It contains a gentle cleansing agent that lathers up amazingly and it smells great as well
review:
I live in north india where the climate is mostly humid and sweat a lot and sweaty scalp means hair fall . My hairs are very dry and frizzy and at times unmanageable but thanks to Head & Shoulder smooth & silky anti dandruff shampoo. Its tri action formula cleanses , nourishes and protects.

It contains a gentle cleansing agent that lathers up amazingly and it smells great as well. And of course it's gentle enough to use everyday even on chemical treated hair.. for the Protection aspects of formula they use micro zinc particles called Zinc pyrithione (ZPT) best known for its use in treating dandruff and seborrhoeic dermatitis.

It does what it says.
Leaves ur hair 10 times stronger ..
As u can see my hair in the picture before and after. I recommend everyone to try this once! :)

headline: Best anti dandruff shampoo
review:
It’s been a lot of years now that I have been using Head & Shoulders.
The shampoo has always been successful in providing nourishment to my hair and giving them a smooth shine. It keeps my scalp dandruff free and helps in conditioning as well.
After using this shampoo it gets really easy for me to tame the frizzy hair. It nourishes and protect me the scalp and thus leaves it dandruff free.
Head & Shoulders smooth and silky is my favourite variant because of its pleasant smell and formula.
I would recommend this to anybody looking for shampoo which is anti dandruff and at the same time leaves hair smooth and silky.

headline: It has helped reduce my dandruff problem and I like its fragrance as well
review:
I have dandruff and have recently colored my hair as well. It is difficult to find a shampoo that is suitable for both my requirements. Head & Shoulders is a mild shampoo that can cater to both my needs.
It has helped reduce my dandruff problem and I like its fragrance as well. In the summers, the menthol gives a cooling effect. The price is affordable and the shampoo is very impressive. For best results, do buy the conditioner, too.

headline: Satisfied: Best for summers
review: H&S is a household brand name & rightly so. The products are worthwhile. It’s summer time now and our hair needs shampooing all the more!! I ordered this H&S “smooth & silky” shampoo of 1 litre. Quite a wise choice as 1.) my hair feels fresh. 2.) It’s a huge bottle and will work for the entire summer season. It also works on my dandruff which is the best part. There’ll be nothing else that I need! Satisfied.

headline: The Shampoo I trust!
review: The best thing about Head & Shoulders (smooth &silky) Shampoo is, it doesn't make my hair rough like other anti-dandruff shampoos. Two years back, I was frantically searching for a shampoo that can solve my dandruff problem without damaging my hair. After using a couple of other brands, I finally settled with H&S.  It gently takes care of the hair and scalp making it dandruff-free. It also leaves my hair soft and manageable. Value for money as the dispenser allows you to use just the right amount you need. Last but not the least, its fine fragrance is just my favourite.

headline: Value For Money
review: Actually, I bought the shampoo because it seemed good value for money. I mean Rs 539 for 1L is really affordable, it seemed like a steal deal. And I am happy I took this risk because the shampoo is worth it. It lives up to its promise of smooth and silky. As I colour my hair, it tends to break and become frizzy. So, this shampoo helps. Albeit, I do suggest that people use it in small quantities and do two washes rather than taking a lot and trying to get results in one wash.

headline: Highly Recommended Shampoo
review: I highly recommend this shampoo, especially if you love washing your hair often. I have long hair and keeping them dandruff-free can become a challenge. When I started using this product I noticed that my dandruff reduced significantly, and my hair also started showing a healthy shine. This shampoo is really amazing, and does not dry-up the hair. The pump packaging makes it fun to squirt out the right quantity, and the shampoo also lathers easily. So this is going to last me a good duration.

headline: Worked well for me!
review: In the changing weather, the ends of my hair goes extremely dry. Recently, I started using this shampoo and I loved how it left my hair smooth and the scalp, oil free. Also, I did notice that it reduced the frizziness of my hair as well. Lastly, it does calm down the dandruff aspect.

headline: Stays true to its claims
review: This shampoo stands true to its claim. It controls dandruff in the first wash itself. It doesn't make my hair dry but if I use too much of the quantity, it does. It has a nice fragrance and has a refreshing effect on hair after every wash. This shampoo will suit all hair types!

headline: Loved it!
review: Head and shoulders is one brand I have always trusted for dandruff related hair problems. Earlier I used to feel that my hair was becoming dry after repeated use, but with this particular shampoo, I am so happy. It makes my hair smooth and silky also. And the fragrance is also very good!

headline: Smooth and Silky
review: I have the tendency to change shampoos every two months. So, I recently bought this from Amazon. Head & Shoulders has been a brand I have known and used time and again. So, I loved using it as usual. It leaves my hair soft and silky. Has a refreshing smell and also adds a little volume. It maybe a little frizzy right after you wash it but then after an hour, it just gets fine and smooth. Definitely recommended!

headline: My hair feels smooth and silky
review:
For long I believed that Head and Shoulders made the hair dry and damaged the scalp and what not! After reading all the reviews, decided to get this for myself and wow! this is not what i expected! it smells good, my hair feel smooth and no my scalp isn't dry! The itchiness of my scalp is gone and I am super happy to see the way my hair feels right now!
I would totally recommend this and it is so economical!

Overall, I'd give the new Head & Shoulders Smooth and Silky Shampoo a 5/5!
